M0.0.state_text:
Welcome to the ALERT Module. This tool will guide you through the Alert process.

For more information see Terms and Conditions

state_answers.text: I understand that personal data from other individuals cannot be uploaded and shared through this Alert Module or any of the sections and tools of this website.
Please Select the Country where incident took place
Please provide the City where incident tool place
Please specify the approximate time of the suspect event. (Optional)
How would you classify the character of the incident?(you can choose more than one option)

state_answers.text: Subject of the Alert Description

Please provide us a description of what has happened. (As best you can please answer the following questions: Who did it? What exactly happened. When did it happen? Where did it happen? Why did it happen? What is your interpretation of what happened? )
Please provide us an estimated date within you would like to receive a feedback from the other FLPs.

state_answers.text_description: If you wish to be involved only in activities related to your city, please check the box labelled as “City level". Otherwise you might  be involved in nationwide activities.
